title: Study on the heat transfer performance of heat exchange surfaces and flow channels under negative pressure
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,2900-2913
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00438H, Paper
ZhongXing Ji, Chao Zhang
This paper presents a theoretical analysis and simulation study on heat transfer characteristics under negative pressure. The results can provide guidance for the design and optimization of heat transfer equipment under negative pressure.
